column4: Hello everyone  I wonder what does this error message mean hd0,0 NTF5S, No Wuibldr . Ubuntu was installed on Vista and it ran very well for a few days until I started receiveing this message ?
Would I be able to recover the Ubuntu system or I require to go for a fresh install ?
you could mount the wubi filesystem from say running a linux livecd, as it is just an image file inside vista. I'm not sure how you would need to fix this boot problem, though
